line_1: A mere disguise in which a devil lurks,
line_2: Who yet betrays his secret by his works.

line_1: What is this power which thus within thee lurks,
line_2: And all unseen, like a masked giant works?

line_1: Dry dust beneath the bubbling surface lurks,
line_2: And mocks his pains the more, the more he works:

line_1: Can see his love, though secret evil lurks
line_2: In all we touch, stamp'd plainly on his works,
